text: Usher is the debut album by American singer Usher. It was released on August 30, 1994 on LaFace Records. == History == The album reached number 167 on the Billboard 200 chart. It was given positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== Sample credits *"Think of You" is a sample of "Tidal Wave" recorded by Ronnie Laws. == References == == Other websites == * * Usher at Discogs Category:1994 albums Category:Usher albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Usher (album)
